errors.tryAgain: Please try again; you may need to reload the page.
errors.notAuthenticated: You do not have permissions to {{actionName}} the {{itemName}}, because you are not authenticated. Please, sign in.
errors.permissionRequired: You do not have the required permissions.
errors.premiumTemplate: You need to be subscribed to a Plan to use the Template Library.
errors.generalAccess: You may have not have the required permissions, or an action is required by parent Company.
errors.notFound: The {{itemName}} could not be found. Please validate it still exists.
errors.serverError: An error occurred while trying to {{actionName}} the {{itemName}}.
errors.checkConnection: The server could not be reached. Check your connection and proxy or firewall settings.
errors.storageSubscription: You need to be subscribed to a Plan to use Storage.
